data.name: Card Shark Demo
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x86/x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes profanity and depictions of suicide, death, violence and gambling. It is not suitable for children.
